data: Verify that an 'Admit to' Order has been entered prior to completing the powerplan (NOT required for direct admit patients)
qMonWedFri, weigh pre breakfast, post AM void, with gown/underwear only
qMonThu, weigh pre breakfast, post AM void, with gown/underwear only
qMon, weigh pre breakfast, post AM void, with gown/underwear only
q4h, heart rate, respiratory rate, temperature and blood pressure
q2h, heart rate, respiratory rate, temperature and blood pressure
q1h, heart rate, respiratory rate, temperature and blood pressure
q12h, heart rate, respiratory rate, temperature and blood pressure
BID, once after lying supine for 5 minutes and once after standing for 2 minutes
for 48 hour, 30 minutes post meals and at 0200h
Provide resources to family for patients on meal support and eating disorders. www.keltyeatingdisorders.ca
Strict (patient may not leave room without physician order)
Nurse assisted to washroom/shower and shower is limited to 10 minutes or less, once per day.  Patient must use shower seat. Wheelchair required for all activities outside of patient room
Review the most current diet order for therapeutic requirements, food texture and fluid thickness. Add anything to be carried forward to the new Diet Order
May have up to a maximum of 1 litre of free water daily
Family / caregiver to record daily intake
Plan Per Dietitian – Healthy Minds Only
When ordering Oral Electrolyte Replacement and Oral Nutrition Supplements at C&W, use Pediatric Formula: Child 1-13 Years OR Pediatric Formula: Child Older Than 13 Years
Pedialyte, 200 mL, Other (Specify in Special Instructions), PO, 6 times a day with meals and snacks
Pediatric Formula: Child Older Than 13 Years
Pedialyte, 200 mL, Other (Specify in Special Instructions), PO, 6 times a day with meals and snacks
